cause.description:
I'm running the NYC 5K Race for the Cure this September and am looking for sponsors! Click the link below to go to my race page and sponsor me!
http://www.komennyc.org/goto/irishlaw2006
If you click the "Donate" button on the cause profile, your donation will go straight to the NYC affiliate of the Komen foundation, which is great too!
1. Breast cancer sucks
2. Lots of people get it
cause.mission: raise money for breast cancer research
cause.name: NYC Race for the Cure
